author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 24-year-old female employee of e-retail company Snapdeal has been missing since Wednesday evening.

While the police have been now probing an abduction case, Dipti Sarna’s employers have launched a campaign on twitter under the hashtag #HelpFindDipti.

Dipti’s friend Farheen said she left her Gurgaon office in the shuttle bus to Udyog Vihar Metro Station to take her usual route to a spot closer to Hindon river from where her father Narendra Sarna would come pick her up everyday.

According to Mr. Sarna, he last spoke to his daughter around 8-15 p.m. when she confirmed she had reached the spot. However, when he reached there she was not present there. The worried father then dialled her number again but it was found to be switched off. After all efforts to trace her or contact her failed, Mr. Sarna approached the police and filed a missing complaint with the police.
title: Snapdeal staffer goes ‘missing’
